218240.name: Planetside 2: Elite Soldier Bundle
218240.description:
Step up your soldier’s arsenal with deeply discounted infantry and Harasser weapons! This bundle contains comparable weapons across all three Empires making this a great deal no matter what your style of play!

The PlanetSide 2 Elite Soldier Bundle contains:
  • One 7-Day Experience Boost – Make the most of your kills!
  • M40 Fury-H (Vanu Sovereignty)
  • M40 Fury-H (Terran Republic)
  • M40 Fury-H (New Conglomerate)
  • NS-7 PDW
  • Cerberus Pistol (Vanu Sovereignty) – A high damage pistol
  • TS2 Inquisitor (Terran Republic) – A high capacity pistol
  • LA3 Desperado (New Conglomerate) – A deadly burstfire pistol
  • Phobos VX86 pump action Shotgun (Vanu Sovereignty)
  • TRS-12 Uppercut pump action Shotgun (Terran Republic)
  • Gd-66 Claw pump-action Shotgun (New Conglomerate)
  • Digital Camo (Vanu Sovereignty)
  • Digital Camo (Terran Republic)
  • Digital Camo (New Conglomerate)
218240.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 法语, 意大利语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 土耳其语
